Johnson,  Integral representations of hermitian forms over local fields
References
[ 1 ] E.  Artin,  Theory of Algebraic Numbers,  Gottingen 1959. 
[ 2 ] S.  Böge,  Schiefhermitesche Formen über Zahlkorpern und Quaternionenschiefkorpern,  J.  f.  d.  reine u.  angew. 
Math.  221 ( 1966 ),  85—112.  [ 3 ] N.  ВошЪакг,  Formes Sesquilinéaires et Formes Quadratiques,  Algèbre,  Chapitre IX,  Paris 1959.  [ 4 ] J.  Dieudonné,  La géométrie des groupes classiques,  Berlin - Gottingen - Heidelberg 1963.  [ 5 ] Я.  Basse,  Äquivalenz quadratischer Formen in einem beliebigen algebraischen Zahlkorper,  J.  f.  d.  reine u. 
angew.  Math.  153 ( 1924 ),  158—162.  [ 6 ] R.  Jacobowitz,  Hermitian forms over local fields,  Am.  J.  of Math.  84 ( 1962 ),  441—465.  [ 7 ] N.  Jacobson,  A note on hermitian forms,  Am.  Math.  Soc.  46 ( 1940 ),  264—268.  [ 8 ] A.  A.  Johnson,  Reflexive forms.  Mimeographed lecture notes.  University of Notre Dame.  [ 9 ] A.  A.  Johnson,  Integral representations of hermitian forms over local fields,  Am.  Math.  Soc.  72 ( 1966 ),  118—121.  [ 10 ] 0.  T.  O'Meara,  The integral representations of quadratic forms over local fields.  Am.  J.  of Math.  80 ( 1958 ), 
843—878.  [ 11 ] 0.  T.  O'Meara,  Introduction to Quadratic Forms,  Berlin - Gottingen - Heidelberg 1963. 
[ 12 ] C.  Riehm,  On integral representations of quadratic forms over local fields.  Am.  J.  of Math.  86 ( 1964 ),  25—62.  [ 13 ] G.  Shimura,  Arithmetic of unitary groups,  Ann.  of Math.  79 ( 1964 ),  369—409.  [ 14 ] С H.  Sah,  A note on hermitian forms over fields of characteristic 2,  Amer.  J.  of Math.  86 ( 1964 ),  262—270. 
Eingegangen 25.  Mai 1966
